c74object.name: seq.rlogic~

attribute.name: outputmode
attribute.digest: Determines what is output from the first outlet when the object triggers an event. For steps with no event, the output will always be 0.

enum.name: gate
enum.description: The value 1 for the duration of the step.

enum.name: count
enum.description: A running count of the number of events.

attribute.name: operator
attribute.digest: The logical operator used to compare the signals at the first and second inlets

enum.name: and
enum.description: Triggers an event only when both of the signals at the first and second inlets are nonzero.

enum.name: or
enum.description: Triggers an event if one or both of the signals at the first and second inlets are nonzero.

enum.name: not
enum.description: Triggers an event only when both of the signals at the first and second inlets are zero.

enum.name: xor
enum.description: Triggers an event only when one (but not both) of the signals at the first and second inlets are nonzero.

enum.name: left
enum.description: Triggers an event only when the signal at the first inlet is nonzero.

enum.name: right
enum.description: Triggers an event only when the signal at the second inlet is nonzero.

c74object.description: seq.rlogic~ compares two signals using boolean operators and is useful for creating interactions between two rhythmic patterns.
